text.__SUMMARY__: Grewia rothii is a species of flowering plant in India and Sri Lanka.
text.In culture: Known as "bora daminiya" in Sinhala and "taviddai" in Tamil.
text.Physiology: Flowers - small, polygamous; Inflorescence- umbels, 1-4 in axils.
text.Uses:
Bark is used in fiber industry.
